ext_description.message: You can easily convert your documents to PDF format. PDF converter to convert documents like Word, Excel or Images to PDF.

ext_description2.message: You can easily convert your documents to PDF format. It's Free.

ext_description3.message: PDF converter to convert documents like Word, Excel or Images to PDF.

ext_description4.message: After the PDF is created it will be sent to you via email.

ext_description5.message: Files can be browsed from local file system or provide URL for the document. (ex: URL for a web page)

msg_notemail.message: It is not a valid email address.

msg_noturl.message: It is not a valid URL.

msg_sentemail.message: The pdf-file will be sent to this e-mail address

msg_spcifyurldoc.message: Please specify the url of the document

msg_supportformat.message: PDF Converter supports the following document formats
